sentences.english: Don't start on him; he's being angry.
sentences.chinese: 别招惹他，他正在气头上呢。

sentences.english: Don't argue with one who is in hot blood.
sentences.chinese: 不要和正在气头上的人争论。

sentences.english: The little girl knew not to irritate her daddy when he was in such a black mood.
sentences.chinese: 小女孩知道她的父亲正在气头上，不该去惹他。

sentences.english: I knew not to irritate him when he was in such a black mood.
sentences.chinese: 他正在气头上，我知道不该去惹他。

sentences.english: She was too angry at the present moment to listen to reason.
sentences.chinese: 此刻她正在气头上，根本就听不进理智的劝告。
